name: COALITION AGAINST PATENT ABUSE
description: Coalition to fight abuses of the patent system.
sampleDescriptions: How patent abuse increases drug prices and solutions to this problem. Maintaining proper standards for patent eligibility. Support and strengthening of IPR.
